title: When can we expect the club system?
body: Really curious about this awesome feature, anyone seen a note dropped anywhere about a release date?

replies.body:
I thought it was scheduled for this patch, but it's clearly not. 

Does anyone have any official Riot posts about it's release? I haven't actually seen anything except for **surrender@20** stuff.
theres no new patch until next year, so its a minimum 3 weeks wait
Is there a link for that? Or are you just going off what has happened in previous years?

read the current patch notes, they say they are the last for this year

>Welcome to patch 5.24, the last one of 2015

Though i wouldn't be surprised if riot goes "oh surprise happy christmas have a patch" but according to them the last patch of this year has been done.
yeah the patch notes and i think scarizard says it in the patch rundown video
They are being really hush hush about the timing of a lot of things atm.
